trans-unit.source: Contains information about the event that is raised when a window is closed.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关关闭窗口时引发的事件的信息。

trans-unit.source: To subscribe to window-closed events, call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler%2A>, specifying <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowClosedEvent> in the `eventId` parameter and supplying an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] event handler that takes a WindowClosedEventArgs parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要订阅窗口关闭事件，调用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler%2A>，并指定<xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowClosedEvent>中`eventId`参数并提供[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]采用 WindowClosedEventArgs 参数的事件处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowClosedEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: When your application receives a window-closed event, the `sender` parameter of the event handler cannot be used to obtain information about the window that has closed, because the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 当你的应用程序接收窗口关闭事件，`sender`的事件处理程序参数不能用于获取有关已关闭，窗口的信息，因为相应[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素将不再有效。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.WindowClosedEventArgs"></xref> class.
The runtime identifier of the window that has closed.
trans-unit.target: 运行时标识符的已关闭的窗口中。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] associated with this event.

When your application receives a window-closed event, the `sender` parameter of the event handler cannot be used to obtain information about the window that has closed, because the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 当你的应用程序接收窗口关闭事件，`sender`的事件处理程序参数不能用于获取有关已关闭，窗口的信息，因为相应[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素将不再有效。

trans-unit.source: Use GetRuntimeId to match the window with a known identifier.
trans-unit.target: 使用 GetRuntimeId 匹配具有已知标识符的窗口。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the window on which the event was raised.
